mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SITE ( URL,FILE_SEQ,CDATE , CTIME) VALUES ( #{url} ,#{fileSeq} , #{cdate}, #{ctime} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE SITE,SCENARIO SET SITE.DDATE=#{ddate}, SITE.DTIME=#{dtime}, SCENARIO.DDATE=#{ddate}, SCENARIO.DTIME=#{dtime}, SITE.VERSION = SITE.VERSION+1, SCENARIO.VERSION = SCENARIO.VERSION+1 WHERE SITE.seq=#{siteSeq} and SCENARIO.seq =#{fileSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq as siteSeq, file_seq as fileSeq, user_seq as userSeq FROM SITE WHERE seq=#{siteSeq}

SELECT site.seq as siteSeq, scenario.seq as fileSeq, site.url as siteUrl, scenario.url as fileUrl FROM SCENARIO, SITE where site.file_seq = scenario.seq AND site.DDATE = 0 AND site.DTIME=0 AND scenario.DDATE = 0 AND scenario.DTIME=0 AND site.user_seq=#{searchKeyword}
ORDER BY site.SEQ ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SITE WHERE DDATE =0 AND DTIME =0
AND URL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND URL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}
